channel.title: Fail closed mechanism with TOR before VPN
channel.description:
I am connecting to Tor before VPN with anonymous-vpn.biz according to this instructions https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nwO31AxfCJM
It is working ok but I dont think it has Fail Closed Mechanism. Is there a way I can just add Fail Closed Mechanism to it? Following some of the instructions in https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Connecting_to_Tor_before_a_VPN?
Thanks.

item.title: Fail closed mechanism with TOR before VPN
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
For reference only:

  • https://anonymous-vpn.biz/setup/how-to-set-up-vpn-in-whonix-gateway/
  • https://anonymous-vpn.biz/cons-u/img/whonix_vpn.sh

It might already include a fail closed mechanism. As the VPN provider if that is the case. Check if https://anonymous-vpn.biz/cons-u/img/whonix_vpn.sh does everything mentioned in Whonix documentation.

Read full topic
item.source: Fail closed mechanism with TOR before VPN
